deprecated_yaml.title: The länderübergreifendes Hochwasser Portal (LHP) YAML configuration is being removed

Configuring länderübergreifendes Hochwasser Portal (LHP) using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.
